questions.question: What were Jem and Dill doing at Barker's Eddy?

choices.answer: Jem was teaching Dill how to swim.

questions.question: Where were Atticus and Calpurnia headed when they picked up Jem and Dill?

choices.answer: To see Bob and Mayella Ewell.

questions.question: Why were they going to see Helen?

choices.answer: To take her the money that the church collected.
To give her clothes and food donated by the community.
To tell her that Tom was shot and killed.
To tell her that Tom was in prison.

questions.question: What did Mr. Underwood's editorial say?

choices.answer: He likened Tom's death to the senseless killing of songbirds
He said that no matter what black people will always act bad
He said that Atticus was the best lawyer in town.
He said that the Ewells are trash.

questions.question: How does writing this editorial make Mr. Underwood brave?

choices.answer: Because no one likes Atticus for defending Tom Robinson.
Mr. Underwood was told to shut his newspaper down.
He went against the common racist belief of Maycomb.
He used swear words and that is against the law.

questions.question: Mr. Underwood meant "in the secret courts of men's hearts Atticus had no case. Tom was dead...

choices.answer: when he decided to get married and have children."
the minute Mayella opened her mouth and screamed."

questions.question: When Bob Ewell said "one down and about two more to go", who was one down?
Who is one of the "two to go"?
Who did Cecil Jacobs talk about during current events at school?
What confuses Scout about her teacher Mrs. Gates?

choices.answer: She doesn't understand how she teaches math.
She doesn't understand why Mrs. Gates is mean to students.
She doesn't understand how she can like Miss Stephanie.
How Miss Gates hate Hitler, but be mean to folks at home?

questions.question: What was the first thing that happened in Maycomb county in October?

choices.answer: Bob Ewell got and lost a job in a matter of days.
Miss Maudie's house caught fire again.

questions.question: What was the second thing to happen in Maycomb county in October?

choices.answer: Someone tried to break into Judge Taylor's house.
Bob Ewell spit in Atticus's face again.

questions.question: What was the third thing to happen in Maycomb county in October?

choices.answer: The Ewell children all finished the first grade.
Bob Ewell was following Helen to work and harassing her.
Jem and Scout saw Boo Radley.
Dill came to Maycomb to live permanently.

questions.question: What nice thing did Mr. Link Deas do for Helen?

choices.answer: He made a job for her, even though he didn't really need her
He helped to care for her children while she was at work.
He bought her a new dress for the funeral.

questions.question: How did Link Deas come to Helen's rescue?

choices.answer: He saved her from a burning building.
He threatened Bob Ewell and walked Helen to work.
He built her a new home when hers burned down.
He jumped in front of the bullet Bob Ewell shot at her.

questions.question: Why is Bob Ewell mad at Atticus and Judge Taylor? He won the case.

choices.answer: He thinks that they are snobs.
He does not like Jem and Scout, or Judge Taylor's wife.
They made him look like a fool in court.
They were friendly with Helen Robinson.

questions.question: What does Mrs. Merriweather think is wrong with the way the Mrunas live?

choices.answer: They are one big tribal family.
They should teach their children to speak English.

questions.question: What happened to Miss Tutti and Miss Frutti on Halloween?

choices.answer: Wicked children hid their furniture in the cellar as a joke.
Wicked children threw eggs at their house.
Boo Radley looked through their windows and scared them.

questions.question: How did this change Halloween for the children of Maycomb?

choices.answer: They were not allowed to dress up in costume.
There would be a Halloween fair at the school.
You would get put in jail for practical jokes on Halloween.

questions.question: What did Scout have to dress as for the pageant?

When does this story take place?
Where does this story take place?
What county does this story take place in?
What is Jem's real name?
